model: IQ Robot Vacuum with Self-Empty Base (RV1001)

problems.title: Robot Not Emptying into Base
problems.description: The robot docks, the base vacuum runs, but the robot's bin is still full.
possible_causes: Debris flap on robot bin is stuck
Robot bin filter is too dirty (blocking airflow)
solution_steps: Check the flap on the bottom of the robot's dust bin. Ensure it moves freely.
Remove the clear plastic window on the bottom of the Base to clear clogs.
Wash the filter inside the robot's bin.

problems.title: Side Brushes Bent / Not Spinning
problems.description: Side brushes are curled up or fell off.
solution_steps: If bent, you can soak them in hot water to straighten them.
If bristles are missing, snap on new ones.
